Hello Titles! Notice the equally long equals signs¶

Make changes by cd docs, make html. Make sure you have the venv selected

This is how you make a hyperlink, by writing Index

you can also do extermal links like this or even

like this: ‘a link’_.

You can reference different parts in the same doc with Learn how to link to a different section.

A subheading¶

\[ \begin{align}\begin{aligned}(a + b)^2 = a^2 + 2ab + b^2\\(a - b)^2 = a^2 - 2ab + b^2\end{aligned}\end{align} \]

Since Pythagoras, we know that \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\).

No space between last word and bracket!

alsothisis italics andthisis bold and ‘’’ this is code. None of this can start with whitespace and needs to be separated from non text with backslash and space ‘’’ Code can also be:

made like this, with blank lines

Nice!

  • this is a bullet list

    • and a nested list, needs blank lines from parent

  • with two items

  1. And a numbered list

  2. And a numbered list but without needing the numbers

I can preserve line breaks with
OR signs at the front
